silverlib.geo

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.geo.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Dot, Line, Rect

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract class to represent a 2D shape

      • Shape

        public Shape(Point l,
             java.awt.Color c)
        Initializes a Shape object from a Point and a Color. Used as a super() constructor in all subclasses.
        Parameters:
        l - The location of the shape in a 2D coordinate plane.
        c - The Color of the shape
        Since:
        1.5

      • Shape

        public Shape(Point l)
        Initializes a Shape object from a Point. Initializes col as Color.BLACK. Used as a super() constructor in all subclasses.
        Parameters:
        l - The location of the shape in a 2D coordinate plane.
        Since:
        1.5
